T02D2829:175a-0: @175a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2829:175a-1: glang chen lpags bsnams bcu drug phyed phyed gdong pa can //
T02D2829:175a-2: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo mda' thogs de bzhin g-yon //
T02D2829:175a-3: dril bu sdigs mdzub kha tv'am gzhu 'dzin rngam pa'i sku //
T02D2829:175a-4: gtum chen zhabs brgyad bgegs brgyad mgo mnan rgyal gyur cig /'jig rten thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2829:175a-5: pha rol rnam gnon mthing ga drag / gdug pa kun gyis sku brgyan pa //
T02D2829:175a-6: me dpung rab 'bar dpa' bo bsgoms //
T02D2829:175a-7: snying rje khros pas sku bsgyur la //
T02D2829:175a-8: dus gsum sangs rgyas cod pan 'chang //
T02D2829:175a-9: rus pa'i gdugs phub 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02D2829:175a-10: 'khor gnyis kyis ni las byed pa'o //
T02D2829:175a-11: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a k'a ru ni ka tsanda ma h'a
T02D2829:175a-12: ro sha ni bha ya ha ra ne raksha ba
T02D2829:175a-13: ra nam gub ti pa re bi dze sv'a h'a
T02D2829:175a-14: / gcan gzan drag po rnams kyi mche ba dang
T02D2829:175a-15: sder mo'i rtse mo la ni rgod dang rgyal po'i
T02D2829:175a-16: khrag gam son mo'i chus byugs la rig pa brgya
T02D2829:175a-17: bzlas la dpung par bcing ngo //
T02D2829:175a-18: 'jigs skyob khro bo drag shul che //
T02D2829:175a-19: mdun nas 'gro zhing chom rkun gsod //
T02D2829:175a-20: dga' byed drag po phag khrid pa //
T02D2829:175a-22: ji srid ya nga'i lam bskyab nas //
T02D2829:175a-23: spyod yul phyin par gyur pa na //
T02D2829:175a-24: gnyis 'dus mgon po rgyan med zhi //
T02D2829:175a-25: sku gzugs rnam pas mchod pas mnyes //
T02D2829:175a-26: sna tshogs 'jigs pas yang nyam thag dang //
T02D2829:175a-27: gang yang pha rol dregs pas btul byas nas //
T02D2829:175a-28: go 'phang mchog 'dir dngos grub sbyin 'dod pa //
T02D2829:175b-0: rgyal ras bzang la @175b grogs mchog 'dir 'gyur ro //
T02D2829:175b-1: khro dang nga rgyal mang ba dang //
T02D2829:175b-2: sred pas zang zing don gnyer ba //
T02D2829:175b-3: da ni gus par gyur na yang //
T02D2829:175b-4: cho ga 'di las ring bar byed //
